projects.name: Limbic Mate
projects.description: Building on your foundation with AngularJS, you can further enhance your system's user-centricity by implementing features like real-time facial analysis for security or personalization, integrating advanced recommendation algorithms to tailor content, and enabling users to contribute content and feedback for a more engaging experience. Additionally, you could focus on rening the dashboard with customizable widgets and intuitive data visualization. With these additions, your system will offer a comprehensive and dynamic platform that prioritizes user interaction and satisfaction.

projects.name: Cafe Management system
projects.description: The cafe management system aims to streamline the ordering process by leveraging technology to expedite transactions and improve efciency. By maintaining a comprehensive database of customer records, including order history and preferences, the system enables personalized service and targeted promotions. With features such as automated billing and reporting functionalities, the system empowers cafe owners to make data-driven decisions and optimize their operations for greater protability. Overall, the system enhances the overall customer experience while optimizing internal processes for the cafe's success.

projects.name: Blood Bucket
projects.description: Developed the Blood Donation Management System using Java and MongoDB database as data storage. Implemented features such as donor addition, update, and search for donor based on location and blood group, optimizingthe process of matching donors with recipients through a menu-driven interface using Advance Java Concepts.

experiences.description: Developed various interactive web pages using HTML,CSS,Javascript. Designed a Landing Page, Portfolio and Temperature Converter.
